mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hr_member(mem_userid, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_email, mem_level) VALUES(#{userid}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{lev})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM hr_authority WHERE mem_userid = #{param1} AND mem_auth = #{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT mem_id id, mem_userid userid, mem_pw pw, mem_name name, mem_email email, mem_gender gender, mem_phone phone, mem_birthday birthday, mem_address address, mem_career mem_career, reg_dtm regdtm, mody_dtm doydtm, mem_level lev FROM hr_member WHERE mem_userid = #{userid}
